forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with thunderstorms this evening followed by occasional showers overnight. Low 11C. Winds WSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms and gusty winds early, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 51F. Winds WSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.
